amendment.description: An amendment numbered 41 printed in House Report 118-158 to prohibit funding for administering, implementing, or enforcing Executive Order 14057 (Catalyzing Clean Energy Industries and Jobs Through Federal Sustainability).
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits funding for administering, implementing, or enforcing Executive Order 14057 (Catalyzing Clean Energy Industries and Jobs Through Federal Sustainability).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Zinke amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 212 (Roll no. 378).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A013) offered by Mr. Zinke.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Zinke amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 222 - 212 (Roll no. 378).
